text: Wu Yibing was the defending champion but lost in the second round to Li Zhe. Blaž Kavčič won the title after defeating Hiroki Moriya 6–1, 7–6(7–1) in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==References== *Main Draw *Qualifying Draw Shanghai Challenger - Singles 2018 Singles
title: 2018 Shanghai Challenger – Singles
